mapper.insert: insert into math_review(title, content, id, nick, day, count) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{id}, #{nick}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select * from math_review order by auto desc limit 10 offset #{page}
select * from math_review order by auto desc limit 3 offset 0
mapper.update: update math_review set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where auto = #{num}
update math_review set count = count+1 where auto = #{num}
